results.name: A276085 applied to the intersection of A048103 (p^p-free numbers) and A276156 (sums of distinct primorials).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..34
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: A328828(n) = { my(i=1, p=2); while(n, if((n%p)>1, return(i)); i++; n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (0); };
xref: Cf. A328836 (same terms, sorted into ascending order).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 30 2019
